job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Creating and maintaining assets and components with java, Mendix and other technologies to leverage usage and/or integrate with external (cloud) platforms.
     * Closely collaborating with customers and partners to create innovative products that bring cloud-and external platform capabilities into Mendix web applications.
     * Working on an Enterprise App development platform and we're in it for the long haul. Thousands of developers and millions of end users across the globe rely on your work and each commit can make a lot of impact.
     * Diving into all sorts of technologies to integrate our platform with external systems. While our current focus is on Mendix with Java, we also utilize REST APIs, Python, and cloud technologies, and are open to adopting any new technology necessary to achieve our goals.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Developer

* Creating and maintaining assets and components with java, Mendix and other technologies to leverage usage and/or integrate with external (cloud) platforms.
     * Closely collaborating with customers and partners to create innovative products that bring cloud-and external platform capabilities into Mendix web applications.
     * Working on an Enterprise App development platform and we're in it for the long haul. Thousands of developers and millions of end users across the globe rely on your work and each commit can make a lot of impact.
     * Diving into all sorts of technologies to integrate our platform with external systems. While our current focus is on Mendix with Java, we also utilize REST APIs, Python, and cloud technologies, and are open to adopting any new technology necessary to achieve our goals.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional enterprise application development using Java and Mendix, with some integration of external systems via REST APIs and Python. It lacks specific mentions of AI/ML tasks, models, or frameworks, making it not a fit for ML or GenAI Engineer profiles.

phrases: Creating and maintaining assets and components with java, Mendix and other technologies to leverage usage and/or integrate with external (cloud) platforms.
Closely collaborating with customers and partners to create innovative products that bring cloud-and external platform capabilities into Mendix web applications.
Working on an Enterprise App development platform
Diving into all sorts of technologies to integrate our platform with external systems.
While our current focus is on Mendix with Java, we also utilize REST APIs, Python, and cloud technologies, and are open to adopting any new technology necessary to achieve our goals.
job_tasks.justification: The description heavily emphasizes building and maintaining applications, integrating with external systems, and developing on an enterprise app platform, which are core software development activities.

phrases: Closely collaborating with customers and partners to create innovative products
Thousands of developers and millions of end users across the globe rely on your work and each commit can make a lot of impact.
job_tasks.justification: The role involves collaboration with customers and partners to create products, and understanding the impact of their work on a large user base, indicating a need for business context.

phrases: Closely collaborating with customers and partners
soft_skills.justification: Direct mention of collaboration with customers and partners.

phrases: open to adopting any new technology necessary to achieve our goals.
soft_skills.justification: Indicates a need to learn and adapt to new technologies.

phrases: Thousands of developers and millions of end users across the globe rely on your work and each commit can make a lot of impact.
soft_skills.justification: Focus on creating innovative products and the significant impact of commits suggests a need for ownership and initiative.
